segments.text: Hi , could you help me find a place where I could buy some lunch ?
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: Sure ! What kind of food would you like ?
segments.speaker: S2

segments.text: I was thinking of pizza or something else Italian , maybe .
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: It's right past that last building on the left . Do you want me to go with you ?
segments.speaker: S2

segments.text: Glad you asked me to join you . This will be fun !
segments.speaker: S2
